name: Fidequity
overview:
The Fidequity group provides private equity advisory services to Limited Partners and General Partners worldwide.

With offices in London, Paris and New York, Fidequity creates tailored solutions for investors and fund managers through its holistic approach to the private equity asset class.

Proprietary systems and industry intelligence are leveraged across four business units: Fidequity Financial Services, including fund placement and secondary market advisory; Fidequity Analytics, development of bespoke data products and market research; Clipperton Fidequity, venture capital focused investment banking boutique; and Fidequity Executive, executive search and due diligence services.

For further information, please contact one of Fidequity’s three offices below:

New York Office
